title
Contact Us in Miami
Clevelander South Beach
Clevelander South Beach is much more than just a place to stay—we offer everything you need to experience the best of Miami. From a prime spot on Ocean Drive across from the beach to the buzzy POOL+PATIO, the chilled out SPF4 Sun Deck, and the stunning C-LEVEL Rooftop Terrace, we’ve got something for everyone. Want to learn more? Don’t hesitate to get in touch through the form below.
Address:
1020 Ocean Drive, Miami Beach. FL 33139
Phone:
(877)532-4006
Fax:
(305) 531-3953
Contact Us

Private Events
Group Blocks
title
Group Room Blocks
Private Events with South Beach Style
Impress your guests when you host your next event at Clevelander South Beach. Centrally located in Miami Beach, our iconic Art Deco hotel sits in the heart of Ocean Drive, boasting the most breathtaking views of the beach. Choose from one of our four amazing venues: Kush at Clevelander Sports Bar, our 4th Floor SPF4 Sundeck, our 6th Floor C-Level Rooftop Lounge, or our historic Clevelander Beach Club.
Start Planning
/ title
content
Special Events in Miami
With versatile venues, professional planning services, and world-class in-house entertainment, Clevelander South Beach delivers everything you need for parties and events in Miami. Our 15,000 square feet of space is spread among six indoor and outdoor venues, like our famous Flamingo Room multiuse space with 55-guest capacity.
Start Planning
Image Slide1, Link to Larger Image - pool party
Letâs Work Together
Expert event planners are on hand to manage every detail of your get-together from start to finish, including venue setup, catering, room blocks for out-of-town guests, and even team-building exercises. And don’t forget, our unbeatable location in the heart of Miami enables you and your group to explore the city with ease, pre- or post-event. Ask our staff for the best party spots!
Start Planning
Image Slide1, Link to Larger Image - room with two beds
Group Room Blocks
It’s easy does it when it comes to keeping all your group together, thanks to our group room blocks. During your event planning, we’ll make sure to offer you the best deals on blocks of rooms for your event attendees.
Start Planning
Image Slide1, Link to Larger Image - man on the phone
/ content
custom1
Venues
Pool + Patio
Located on the ground level, our iconic POOL+PATIO is the center of all the action at the hotel.
SPF4 Sun Deck
Located on the 4th floor, SPF4 Sun Deck provides spectacular views of South Beach.
C-Level Rooftop Terrace
Party like a rock star on Miami's premiere Rooftop C-LEVEL with views of Ocean Drive and South Beach.
Shuckers Sports Bar At Clevelander
Watch every game, every time at our ultimate destination for sports in Miami!
Flamingo Rooms
Our private meeting or event space located on the 2nd floor overlooking Clevelander Beach Club & Ocean Drive.

Something Special
Every Week
title
South Beach Events
Excitement Changes Week by Week
Clevelander South Beach is the place where the parties never stop. Step into our Playground and experience Miami Beach’s most iconic clubs, featuring top DJs getting the party started and sexy go-go dancers setting the vibe. Sit poolside at our premier location for the best Miami experience, where our infamous parties call your name all day and all night. As a guest of our hotel, you have an all-access pass to all of Clevelander South Beach’s incredible venues.
/ title
content
FOOTBALL HEADQUARTERS
Clevelander is your ultimate Football Headquarters this season, bringing every game to life with massive screens, booming sound, DJs, drink specials, and nonstop energy right on South Beach. Whether you’re cheering on your team or just here for the game-day vibes, there’s no better place to catch all the action poolside or on the rooftop. From kickoffs to championships, every game feels bigger at Clevelander.
EVENTS & TICKETS
Show All
Choose Filter
Show All
Viewing:
Link to Larger Item Photo, ListItemCarouselImage1
RockStar Karoke
TUESDAYS | 8 PM
Warm up your vocal cords and get ready to sing the night away! If you've never tried karaoke before, what better way than at Clevelander? Remember to order a drink or two for some of that liquid courage! Join us every Tuesday night for Rock Star Karaoke with a $150 bottle special on Bacardi Superior, Moet & Chandon, Smirnoff Vodka, and Jose Cuervo Tequila!
Prizes
Plus. our Grand Prize Winner is awarded up to $100 food and beverage credit that must be redeemed that night.
Tickets
Link to Larger Item Photo, ListItemCarouselImage1
LAUGH IT OFF COMEDY NIGHT
FIRST & THIRD THURSDAY OF THE MONTH | 7PM
Get ready to sip, smile, and Laugh It Off! Our monthly comedy night lighting up every first Thursday of the month!
This night brings you unfiltered laughs, signature cocktails and a rotating lineup of local and touring comedians. Whether you're here for the punchlines or the pours, you'll leave lighter than you came.
Coming up dates:
9/04
9/18
TICKETS
Link to Larger Item Photo, ListItemCarouselImage1
BaeWatch Pool Party
FRIDAYS | 12 PM
You can't come to Miami Beach and not get a little sandy! Be on the lookout for our Clevelander babes who are ready to serve up the best drinks and vibes on Ocean Drive! From 12 p.m. to 2 p.m., enjoy $150 bottles of Bacardi Superior, Moet & Chandon, Smirnoff Vodka, and Jose Cuervo Tequila!
Tickets
Link to Larger Item Photo, ListItemCarouselImage1
Vice Nights Party
FRIDAY & SATURDAY NIGHTS | 9PM
Dive into the rhythm of the night with our electrifying Vice Nights party! Get ready to move to the hottest beats and unleash your inner dance floor star. Join us for a night of non-stop energy, good vibes, and unforgettable moments. Grab your favorite cocktails and dance to Hip-Hop and Reggaeton all night.
Tickets
Link to Larger Item Photo, ListItemCarouselImage1
PLAY Pool Party
SATURDAYS | 12 PM
Are you ready to Play? Experience the energy of South Florida like never before at Clevelander with live entertainment including South Florida's top DJs, dancers, and more! Whether you're battling at a game of beer pong or looking to cool down from the hot Miami sun and take a dip in our pool, we have something for everyone. At Clevelander, the party never ends.
Tickets
Link to Larger Item Photo, ListItemCarouselImage1
Football Sundaze Pool Party
SUNDAYS | 12 PM
Sundays at the pool just got a game day upgrade. Football, DJs, cocktails, and poolside vibes — it’s everything you love about Sunday Funday, now with all the action from the field
Tickets
Link to Larger Item Photo, ListItemCarouselImage1
MIAMI VICE ANNUAL REUNION
SEPTEMBER 9-14
Join the cast and crew of the iconic 80's TV series for parties, pictures, autographs, filming location tours, bar crawls, fashion shows, cast and crew hosted dinner experiences and panels, live performances, karaoke, and more! Our inaugural event in September 2024 was a smash worldwide success and we are doing it all again in 2025!
TICKETS
Link to Larger Item Photo, ListItemCarouselImage1
GLOW WILD EXPERIENCE
SEPTEMBER 27TH | 10PM-4AM
Step into a world of glow sticks, electrifying energy, and next-level vibes under the Miami night sky.
A multisensory experience of music, movement, and unforgettable moments — this is more than a party.
Get ready for special guests & performances AND world-renowned special guest DJ OSOCITY is taking over behind the decks - Ibiza to LA to MIAMI you won't want to miss this set!
ð Epic DJs. Neon dreams. Culture on fire.
â¨ Be part of the glow. Let the night light you up. â¨
TICKETS
Link to Larger Item Photo, ListItemCarouselImage1
SALSA UNDER THE STARS
SEPTEMBER 20TH | 7PM-10PM
Join us for a fiery night of dancing beneath the Miami sky! Whether you're a salsa pro or just love to move, we've got you covered. A live salsa instructor will guide you through the steps. No partner, no experience, no cover charge needed. Just good vibes, great music, and salsa under the stars!
RSVP
Weekly Events and Party Packages
The party never stops at Clevelander South Beach. Party-goers can soak up the sun at our Beach Club or grab a cocktail and dance the night away! There's no better place to celebrate while you stay with us in Miami!
Show All
Choose Filter
Show All
Viewing:
Link to Larger Item Photo, ListItemCarouselImage1
HOLIDAY PARTY PACKAGE
Celebrate the season at Clevelander South Beach with our all-inclusive holiday party packages:
$2,800 for up to 20 guests
$5,800 for up to 40 guests
Both packages include a 2-hour open bar, build-your-own holiday platters, valet service, festive décor, fun games (Giant Jenga, Connect Four & Cleve Cornhole), plus your company logo on our 20ft LED screen.
â¨ Rooms available starting at $99 — take the elevator home!
BOOK NOW
Link to Larger Item Photo, ListItemCarouselImage1

Beachin' Bride (up to 10 guests) | $1,300 All-In Package
Bride's Last Ride (up to 15 guests) | $1,700 All-In Package

Reserve
VIP Packages
Ready to take your South Beach vacation to the next level? Add a VIP package and get ready for some serious fun in the sun—and well into the night! With exclusive access to private pool parties and much more, you'll feel like a true celebrity in Miami's hottest destination. Don't settle for an ordinary vacation—go VIP and make unforgettable memories!
VIP Packages
